verbose_text: Zhao et al demonstrated that Bip / GRP78, activating transcription factor 6, eukaryotic translation initiation factor 2A and XBP1, which are signaling molecules of ER stress, are elevated in the lungs of mice with BLM induced pulmonary fibrosis.
